name: Zombie Virus Survival
description:
There are two rules when dealing with Zombies:
Rule #1 – Don’t get infected.
Rule #2 – See rule #1!

The Zombie horde is chasing you but you can prevent infection by crushing each virus before it gets you. Keep your blood healthy and avoid the deadly plague! Save yourself!

Zombie Virus Survival is a fast-paced action game with a shocking surprise if you become infected by the Zombies. Who will you infect next?
